instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U7100: What is U7100? U7100 refers to the ISL6259 or ISL9239 charging IC on Macbooks from 2013 to the present.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.PP5V_S5: What is PP5V_S5? This is a 5v power rail that is present when the machine is in an S5 soft off state..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no power no green light nor orange light
threads.message:
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> initially was 1.7 v, I changed <CHIP>U7100</CHIP>, I now got 8v
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>-8v
Pp3v42- 3.4v no light on charger. 
<SIGNAL>PP5V_S5</SIGNAL>- 0v
Pls help.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no power no green light nor orange light
threads.message:
PLEASE, post accurate information.
8V is not the same as 8.2V, or 8.5V; the difference is VERY important.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no power no green light nor orange light
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no power no green light nor orange light
threads.message: It’s fixed✅✅✅. I changed <CHIP>U7100</CHIP> and I reflowed the smc. Thank man

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no power no green light nor orange light
threads.message:
<CHIP>U7100</CHIP> was probably good, but not controlled by SMC.
You should REBALL, not reflow the SMC; if want to really solve the problem.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no power no green light nor orange light
threads.message: Thank. The problem is resolved. I rebelled it. Fixedddd.
